mapper.select: SELECT t.purchase_id id,t.purchase_endTime endTime,u.user_name name FROM tran_purchase t ,tran_user u WHERE t.user_id=u.user_id

SELECT p.pod_id id,s.supplier_name name,p.pod_beginTime beginTime,u.user_name uname,p.pod_type type FROM tran_purchase_order p,tran_supplier s,tran_user u WHERE p.supplier_id=s.supplier_id AND u.user_id=p.user_id
SELECT r.input_id id,r.input_date date,u.user_name name,r.input_type type FROM tran_input_Response r ,tran_user u WHERE u.user_id=r.user_id
SELECT o.out_id id,o.out_time time,u.user_name name,o.out_type type FROM tran_out_Response o ,tran_user u WHERE u.user_id=o.user_id
SELECT g.deliver_id id,u.user_name name,g.deliver_date date,g.Deliver_type type FROM tran_deliver_goods g,tran_user u WHERE g.user_id=u.user_id

SELECT o.order_id id,o.order_name `name`,o.order_in_time `time`,o.order_type `type`,o.order_pay pay,o.order_status state FROM tran_deliver_goods g ,tran_order o,tran_user u WHERE g.order_id=o.order_id AND g.user_id=u.user_id
